title: Microsoft Cloud App Security: MFA step-up auth
description:
,This feature enablesenforcing of conditional access policies during a user session. For example, if a user attempts to download a sensitive document to an unmanaged device, theycan be prompted to satisfy an MFA challenge. Status is specific to Preview
More info: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/cloud-app-security/release-notes
Preview date: October CY2021
